DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Immunomodulatory Therapy Adult Patients With Perennial Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate perennial allergic rhinoconjunctivitis due hypersensitization towards house dust mite and/or cat allergens Clinical relevant allergy ( perennial seasonal ) could potentially interfere patient 's study treatment schedule assessment . Use concomitant medication could affect patient 's study treatment response assessment result . Any clinically relevant concomitant disease judge investigator .
